key.name: icon-size
key.description: Set the size for the desktop icons.

key.name: show-home
key.description: Show the personal folder in the desktop.

key.name: show-trash
key.description: Show the trash icon in the desktop.

key.name: start-corner
key.description: Set the corner from where the icons will start to be placed.

key.name: show-volumes
key.summary: Show external drives in the desktop
key.description: Show the disk drives connected to the computer.

key.name: show-network-volumes
key.summary: Show network drives in the desktop
key.description: Show mounted network volumes in the desktop.

key.name: add-volumes-opposite
key.summary: Add new drives to the opposite side of the screen
key.description: When adding drives and volumes to the desktop, add them to the opposite side of the screen.

key.name: show-drop-place
key.summary: Shows a rectangle in the destination place during DnD
key.description: When doing a Drag'n'Drop operation, marks the place in the grid where the icon will be put with a semitransparent rectangle.

key.name: sort-special-folders
key.description: When arranging Icons on desktop, to sort and change the position of the Home, Trash and mounted Network or External Drives

key.name: keep-arranged
key.description: Always keep Icons Arranged by the last arranged order

key.name: keep-stacked
key.description: Always keep Icons Stacked, Similar types are grouped

key.name: unstackedtypes
key.summary: Type of Files to not Stack
key.description: An Array of strings types, Don't Stack these types of files

key.name: use-nemo
key.description: Use Nemo instead of Nautilus to open folders.

key.name: show-link-emblem
key.description: Add an emblem to allow to identify soft links.

key.name: dark-text-in-labels
key.description: Paint the label text in black instead of white. Useful when using light backgrounds.

key.name: check-x11wayland
key.summary: Show a popup if running on X11Wayland
key.description: Whether DING should show a popup if it is running on X11Wayland, or the user decided to not show it anymore.
